resources.string: Select the age group of your child
Choose the language(s) you wish to watch.

This is a FREE version of this application. Paid version includes large selection of videoEntities, sorting by child\'s age, regular videoEntity updates and more.

For feedback and more information about this application, as well as mobile phone development and training please contact:

You EXIT in menu to quit the application.
There are no videos for this age and language combination.
There was an error initializing the YouTubePlayer (%1$s)
We\'re sorry, but the application was unable to connect with the server. Please check back shortly.
Thank you for using ChildrenTV! We hope you enjoy this app as much as we do. Please don\'t hesitate to let us know what you think!
Feedback for ChildrenTV app - Android v.%1$s
We hope you are enjoying this application.

It takes a lot of effort to collect and regularly review all videoEntities. We are asking you to donate a small amount ($0.99) to help us finance that effort. Users who donated will not see similar pop-ups, nor advertisements on top of videoEntities for a year. Please note we cannot control advertisements inside YouTube videoEntities.
We understand you may not be able to donate at this time, so instead we ask you to help us by sharing this app with your friends.
You will be able to resume playing soon.
Do you really want to exit the application?
I am enjoying ChildrenTV - videoEntities for kids application by #CyberWalkAbout %1$s
It takes a lot of work to review, rate and add new videos, please support us by purchasing the subscription.
The video will have to go through the review process before it is added to the application.
Please help us to categorize media, select appropriate age and language.
